entries.seebib: Go up and see Bib Fortuna.  My tasks are for less experienced individuals.
entries.hr_29: You again?  Have you thought about that work I mentioned earlier?
entries.hr_28: Well, as impressed as Bib gets, really.  That is, he didn't act disappointed or execute anybody when he heard you had killed the target.  But anyway...
entries.hr_27: Go see Bib upstairs.  He'll let you in now that he sort of knows who you are.
entries.hr_25: Congratulations.  That's good work that you do.  You're gonna do well on this planet, I can feel it.
entries.hr_24: Good.  Bib's counting on you to make him look good.   You pull this off and I'll get you in to see him personally.
entries.hr_23: Jabba's chief rival is Lady Valarian.  It was some of her thugs trying to act big.  They picked the wrong week cause Jabba's just been looking for an excuse.  And like I said, Bib loves to look good for the girls.
entries.hr_21: Who's crazy enough to do this?
entries.hr_20: Some thugs roughed up one of Jabba's dancers the other day in town, and Bib wants to make an example of them.  Plus I think he's trying to get the dancers to like him.  Anyway.  Just teach these guys a lesson.
entries.hr_17: That's fine, but don't take forever.  I got lots of other things to do you know.
entries.hr_16: Bib was very impressed.  He says he may have a place for you at the palace, since they've had some...uh...openings...recently.  But we need you to do just a little more to prove yourself.
entries.hr_13: You did good work for us there.  Can we count on you to do some more?
entries.hr_11: Well, as long as you keep our little chat to yourself I'll let you go then.
entries.hr_10: Bib had some issues with his own people a while back, and he's sort of been hiding out here on Tatooine.  Anytime someone starts asking questions he
entries.hr_12: Ok, I'll upload his last known to your datapad.  Return here when the deed is done and we'll talk further about your usefulness.
entries.hr_9: Why does Bib care about this guy?
entries.hr_7: Good.  What I want you to do is to find this stang who's been asking too many questions about Bib Fortuna.  Bib wants him
if you know what I mean.
entries.hr_6: Sorry, I can't work for the Hutts.
entries.hr_4: I thought you had that look about you.  I work for Jabba the Hutt.  Is that going to be a problem?
entries.hr_3: I think you have the wrong guy.
entries.hr_2: Yeah, I could use some work like that.
entries.hr_1: You look like the kind of person that could use some work.  That is, if you aren't too worried about what the
